long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get independent opinions from people you respect on important matters. Instantly.

OPINIONS.FYI is a Twitter-based social layer over the Internet, built into your browser, extending your usual browsing experience.

Discover context 

- Explore reactions, thoughts and insights of outstanding people who watched an article, video, news, podcast or any other webpage.
- Get related pages, suggested materials, contextual facts and alternative views. 
- All without leaving a page.

Get the media selection from people you trust 

Read a chronological feed of content picked by top authors, founders, CEOs, VCs, scientists, politicians, climatologists, women in tech, whatever you choose...
complemented by alternative opinions of other top minds instead of noise of usual social networks.


Our mission: to build for a healthy information environment

Enjoy quality opinions from thousands of Twitter verified users

https://opinions.fyi/
https://twitter.com/OpinionsFYI
